thread.title: Sarah Fisher Promoted to Manager of Marketing and Communications at Coghlin Companies
thread.title_full: Sarah Fisher Promoted to Manager of Marketing and Communications at Coghlin Companies

author: admin
title: Sarah Fisher Promoted to Manager of Marketing and Communications at Coghlin Companies
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/16/2015 @ 11:11 AM   Coghlin Companies 
WORCESTER, Mass., Oct. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Coghlin Companies, a concept to commercialization product development and contract manufacturing service provider, announces the promotion of Sarah Fisher to Manager of Marketing and Communications. Fisher will be responsible for the planning, development and implementation of the organization's marketing and communications strategies, as well as enhancing the internal Caring Associate experience and external customer experience through collaborative, creative, and focused marketing campaigns for Coghlin Companies and its subsidiaries, Columbia Tech and Cogmedix. 
"Sarah has shown consistent diligence and passion for her work," said Chris Coghlin, President and CEO of Coghlin Companies. He continued, "She truly understands the company culture at Coghlin, and we are confident in her abilities to represent us in marketing and communications with our current clients and potential clients." 
Fisher joined Coghlin Companies in 2013 from Applied Interactive , a web marketing company located in Worcester, MA. Fisher holds her MBA and a BS in Management and Entrepreneurship from Clark University . 
"I genuinely enjoy working with the team at Coghlin Companies," said Fisher. She continued, "I look forward to further enhancing our marketing and communications initiatives in my new role as manager." 
Recognized as a contract manufacturing leader offering accelerated time-to-market engineering and contract manufacturing for innovative companies, Coghlin Companies' subsidiaries, Columbia Tech and Cogmedix, have experienced significant growth over the last year in areas including laser medical device manufacturing , bioscience manufacturing , and containerized systems manufacturing. Coghlin Companies continues to recruit employees at all levels within the company. Sarah Fisher's promotion is one of several this year and is reflective of the career growth available Coghlin Companies. 
About Coghlin Companies 
Coghlin Companies, Inc. is a privately held Concept to Commercialization company providing time to market engineering and manufacturing services for its diversified innovation client base through its wholly owned subsidiaries Columbia Tech and Cogmedix. Columbia Tech provides product development, manufacturing, global fulfillment and aftermarket services through its "Time to Market at WARP SPEED(TM)" mission. Cogmedix is an FDA registered, ISO 13485 certified manufacturing service provider of medical devices focusing on electronic, electro-mechanical and electro-optical systems through its "Medical Technology Brought to Life(TM)" mission. Learn more about Coghlin Companies at www.CoghlinCompanies.com and sign up for the e-newsletter. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/sarah-fisher-promoted-to-manager-of-marketing-and-communications-at-coghlin-companies-300161326.html 
SOURCE Coghlin Companies
